definition: Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Liven up a girlie night in with this fabulous Frog Prince Lighted Wine Stopper.
sentences.chinese: 奇异的青蛙王子低度葡萄酒瓶塞让美女之夜焕发生机。

sentences.english: When such a reservoir is drilled, it behaves a bit like an uncorked bottle of champagne.
sentences.chinese: 当我们在油层上钻挖，情况会有点像拔起香槟的瓶塞。

sentences.english: The champagne cork popped when he pulled it out.
sentences.chinese: 他拔香槟酒的瓶塞时它砰的一声开了。

sentences.english: The latest to pop the champagne corks of conspicuous consumption is China.
sentences.chinese: 最新开启炫耀性消费香槟酒瓶塞的国度是中国。

sentences.english: Someone can drink without unplugging stopper. Can you make it?
sentences.chinese: 有人不拔开瓶塞，就可以喝到酒，你能做到吗？

sentences.english: Fill and cork these bottles please.
sentences.chinese: 把这些瓶子灌满并用瓶塞塞紧。

sentences.english: She uncorked the bottle and dumped oil out.
sentences.chinese: 她拔掉瓶塞，把里面的油倒出来。
瓶塞扑通一声地拔了出来。

definition: to unscrew/to twist off (a lid)/to turn on (a faucet)/to switch on (by turning a knob)/to turn (a door handle)/to wrench apart
to close up/to heal (of wound)/to keep one's lips sealed
